This app demonstrates all the available parameters of `page_opts`:

1. `title`: Sets the page title
2. `window_title`: Sets the browser window/tab title
3. `lang`: Sets the HTML language code
4. `theme`: Uses a custom theme with added CSS rules
5. `fillable`: Makes the page fill the viewport
6. `full_width`: Uses the full width of the browser

The app includes:

1. A sidebar with controls:
   - Date range picker
   - Category selector
   - Value threshold input
   - Dark mode toggle

2. Main content with:
   - Statistics card
   - Time series plot
   - Value boxes with icons
   - Detailed data table with DataGrid

3. Features:
   - Responsive layout using `layout_columns`
   - Full-screen capable cards
   - Custom theme
   - Dark mode toggle
   - Interactive filtering
   - Font Awesome icons
   - Data visualization

To run this app, you'll need these package dependencies:
```
pip install shiny pandas numpy matplotlib
```

The app creates its own sample data, so no external files are needed. The data is randomly generated when the app starts and includes dates, values, and categories that can be filtered and visualized in various ways.
